tool_description:
Our cell phones / mobile phones specs database (GSM specs) is a collection of specifications and features of different models of mobile phones (more than 10,000 models). This information includes the device's dimensions,  images, weight, display size and type, processor, memory, storage, camera specifications, battery capacity, operating system, and connectivity options, among others. 
The purpose of this database is to provide a comprehensive source of information for consumers to compare an...
title: Mobile Phone Specs Database

api_list.name: Get {Phone Image ids} by {Custom id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-phone-images-ids-by-phone-custom-id/{phonecustomid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get {Specifications} by {Brand Name} and {Model Name}
api_list.description: Get all phone specifications by brand name and model name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-specifications-by-brandname-modelname/{brandname}/{modelname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get {Image} by {Phone Image id}
api_list.description:
- Get Image by Id
- Paste image ID from this api "Get all phone image ids by phone custom id" and image media content is returned
- ex of image id : "Z2RjOG80Smk2WVV2R0wwR1F1RjRNZG5TR1ZqUUZuU1JhU1pNT0FjNG94UT0="
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-image-by-id/{imageid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
